title: Integrating behavioral health, primary care can save money
description: A Colorado program saved more than $1 million by creating a risk-adjusted payment system for practices that had on-site behavioral health providers. Click here to learn more!

title: Half of PCPs Aware of Medicare Reimbursement for Chronic Care Mgmt
description: Only about one-half of primary care providers were aware of a Medicare reimbursement code for chronic care management, a new survey found.Click here to continue reading!

title: Intervention before visits can improve doctor-patient conversations
description: Click here to learn why it's important for doctors to have this conversation before appointments with their patients.

title: Best Buy sees opportunity in health technologies for elderly
description: Click here to read more about how Best Buy is helping elderly Americans remain in their homes for as long as possible.

title: Patient Liability: Address It Upfront to Restore Healthy Margins
description: Are shrinking margins keeping you up at night? Click here to read this blog and learn about how addressing patient liabilty upfront can help restore financial health.

title: Save the Date: Join us for a MACRA webinar on June 14th!
description: Join us for an upcoming educational webinar on June 14, 2018 discussing MACRA and tips for success!

title: Technical and Clinical Denials: 8 Top Questions Answered
description: nThrive experts answer top questions asked by health care providers.

title: House Reps Want to Extend MSSP Track 1 ACO Participation
description: Several House Representatives asked CMS to extend MSSP Track 1 participation for successful accountable care organizations (ACOs) facing downside financial risk assumption in 2019.

title: Patients want providers with strong online presence
description: Patients say online reviews is the deciding factor of what health professional to see.

title: Doctor EHR frustration can influence patient satisfaction
description: Researchers analyzed feelings around integration of EHRs at an outpatient OB/GYN practice and an inpatient perinatal unit.

title: 69% of Hospitals Use Multiple Vendors for Revenue Cycle Management
description: A new survey shows that most hospital and health systems use several vendor solutions for revenue cycle management, but claim denials continue to be a major issue when operating multiple systems.

title: Join nThrive at the American College of Preventive Medicine Annual Meeting!

title: Patients say fees for accessing medical records are excessive
description: The report also found that some patients aren't aware they can access their records, or that they can challenge providers who deny them.

title: A study finds nurse overtime can degrade collaboration with physicians
description: Authors of the report suggested minimal use of overtime and, more realistically, fatigue management training and education for nurses.

title: Most Physicians Will Not Drop Payer Contract Despite Poor Pay
description: A recent survey showed that the majority of physicians would not back out of a payer contract or drop Medicare and Medicaid patients even though the reimbursement rates were poor.

title: Fewer Americans confident they can afford healthcare
description: People who are insured through employer plans tend to feel more secure about healthcare costs than those with other types of insurance, according to a recent survey.

title: Healthcare Orgs Still Rely on Paper-Based Medical Billing
description: Nearly all healthcare executives in a recent survey said their organization uses paper-based medical billing to collect patient financial responsibility, while half of patients preferred electronic.

title: Google says its deep learning model bests traditional methods in sorting EHR data
description: The company said its methods were better than other EHR models at predicting in-hospital deaths, 30-day readmissions and long lengths of stay.

title: Apple Health Records EHR Data Viewer Will Have Immediate Impact
description: Providers and patients will begin to see the positive impact of Apple Health Records within 6 months, according to most health system executives.

title: Wellness program study measures quality of life variables
description: Workplace wellness programs aim to improve employee health and lower employers' health care costs, but not all programs have the same impact or cost the same.

title: New data sources pose ethical conundrum for AI
description: Industry data miners are increasingly using non-traditional data to predict health outcomes, raising new challenges in complying with global privacy rules.

title: CMS releases new Medicare Advantage data resource
description: The announced annual release of MA encounter data is a good start toward more transparency, as encounter records contain a similar level of information as fee-for-service claims data.
meta_description: The announced annual release of MA encounter data is a good start toward more transparency, as encounter records contain a similar level of information as fee-for-service claims data.
